Class Opponent

java.lang.Object
Opponent
public class Opponent extends Object
Represents the enemy in the game. Has type-based attributes and basic AI behavior for selecting moves.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Opponent(String type, Character Player)
    Constructs an opponent with a specific type and target player.

  • Constructor Details

    • Opponent

      public Opponent(String type, Character Player)
      Constructs an opponent with a specific type and target player.
      Parameters:
      type - the enemy type ("Thief", "Viking", or "Minotaur")
      Player - the player instance to target

  • Method Details

    • GetType

      public String GetType()
      Gets the type of the opponent.
      Returns:
      the type as a string

      public void SetHP(int value)
      Adjusts the opponent's HP by a given amount.
      Parameters:
      value - amount to adjust (negative for damage)

      Gets the opponent's current HP.

      public void SetAttack(int value)
      Adjusts the opponent's attack stat.
      Parameters:
      value - value to add (can be negative)

      public void Attack(int Damage)
      Applies damage to the player.
      Parameters:

    • Charge

      public void Charge(boolean value)
      Sets the opponent's charged status.
      Parameters:
      value - true if charged, false otherwise

    • isCharged

      public Boolean isCharged()
      Returns the opponent's charged state.
      Returns:
      true if charged, false otherwise

    • Defend

      public void Defend(boolean value)
      Sets whether the opponent is defending.
      Parameters:
      value - true if defending, false otherwise

    • GetDefend

      public boolean GetDefend()
      Returns whether the opponent is defending.
      Returns:
      true if defending, false otherwise

    • Think

      public String Think()
      Decides the opponent's next move based on its pattern.
      Returns:
      the chosen move ("Attack", "Defend", or "Charge")
